name: Glimmer (bunnyUFO)
description:
Game is not finished, and currently there is no way to beat boss.
Will keep working on adding missing fight elements.

For now you can:
- Control glimmer, jump, dash, and do attack combos
- Attack tentacles to make them go back (take a while, tentacle health is a bit much)
-Light up lanterns after tentacles retract (will change music and lighting)

Controls

Gamepad Recomended: Controls similar to Elden Ring or Souls-like defaults

                      Gamepad Controls (PS4)     Mouse and Keyboard

Move:                           LS                                            WASD
Look:                             RS                                           Mouse
Jump:                            X                                          Space Bar
Dash:                            O                                             Shift
Light Attack:             LB                               Left Mouse Button
Strong Attack:          RB                              RightMouse Button Backstory

Glimmer is an alternate dream world with ligth spirit inhabitatns named Lumin.

They Lumin cultivate their lifeforce form surrounding light. They refine it and release it back int the world.

Glimmer is a birght beutiful world! or atelast it was... Until Glimmer got invaded by shadow nightmares named Umbra. The Umbra are attempting to cast eternal darkness in Glimmer world and take over!
